ygData.subject: looks like I'm moving :o)
ygData.msgSnippet: My Girlfriend was offered a job back home (her home, Washington, Seattle area) and is leaving in 10 days :o( I plan on going out in late September, hopefully
ygData.messageBody:
My Girlfriend was offered a job back home (her home, Washington,
Seattle area) and is leaving in 10 days :o( I plan on going out in
late September, hopefully by then she can find a roof for us that'll
let us keep our 2 monster dogs (well mines a monster dog, hers only
is if you don't have mine standing next to him like a Barbarian next
to an Ogre :o) ) Then all we'll have to worry about is finding a job
for me....hmmmmm, but hunny, I can sell this stuff on eBay, this IS a
job! hehee ok, that wont happen...not much a lvl 14 Warrior can sell
to keep more than the EQ bill payed :o) guess it's to the classifieds
for me, I HATE job hunting! interviews suck....anyway, you'll be
seeing a lot more of me in-game after the 6th of August until Sept
25th or so :o) and then back to the 'oops girlfriends home, gotta
go!'
/em logs, powers down, runs out to the TV 'What, EQ? no, I'm saving
my playing time for later *snicker* '

ok, sure your tired of this by now :o) I'll let you get on with things

/em waves to the rainbow
/em staps to attention & Salutes Mystic Alliance

Ompa
